GetProductByAmazonSKU.Statement: SELECT w2_ProductVariationView.product_id, w2_ProductVariationView.variation_id, w2_ProductVariationView.use_variation_flg, w2_Product.stock_management_kbn, w2_Product.tax_category_id FROM w2_ProductVariationView INNER JOIN w2_Product ON ( w2_Product.product_id = w2_ProductVariationView.product_id ) WHERE w2_ProductVariationView.shop_id = @shop_id AND @@ amazon_product_where @@ AND w2_ProductVariationView.valid_flg = 1
